           Hypersonic 2 - The Ultimate Virtual Music Workstation

           factory  presets:  thatÃƒÆ’?s  an  almost  overwhelming array of

           And thanks to the unique and proprietary sample optimization

           computer  resources,  with  each  instance  offering  up  to 
           1024-voice  polyphony across 32 stereo outputs. Hypersonic 2

           efficient   and  creative  workflow.  Hypersonic  2:  thatÃƒÆ’?s 
           state-of-the-art   music   creation   at   your  fingertips. 
                     
                     
                     
           Hypersonic 2 Main Features 
                     
                     
           * Four  high  quality  sound  generation  engines  ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â» sample 
             playback,  analog  synthesis,  FM  Synthesis and Wavetable 
             Synthesis 
                     
           * 1800 factory patches + 100 Combis + 135 Drum & Percussion 
             Kits + 111 Drum Loops 
                     
           * 1,7  GB  finest  sample  content total Hypersonic 2 sound 
             palette  covers  any  musical style in top quality ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â» be it 
             pop,  classic,  dance,  hiphop, rock or even country music 
                     
           * General  MIDI  Hypermodule  GM4  included,  playback  any 
             General MIDI file 
                     
           * Excellent  performance:  1024 voices polyphony, 32 stereo 
             outputs, 16 MIDI channels (per instance) 
                     
           * Hyperphrase (polyphonic arpeggiator) with 200 categorized 
             phrases included, featuring MIDI file import 
                     
           * Combi  chain  feature  ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â»  switch combinations of multiple 
             patches per program change / controller chain 
                     
           * Hyper  Knobs  for  fast  and  effective  sound  tweaking 
                     
           * Full  patch editor ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â» get access to hundreds of parameters

           * Integrated  super-fast  search  engine simplifies finding

           * Integrated  mixer  with  level,  pan,  output, FX1-4 send 
                     
           * Integrated MIDI keyboard

           * Expansion bay for up to 5 sound/sample library expansions
